thread.title: Animal Collective to Perform New Music at “Coral Orgy” Event
thread.title_full: Animal Collective to Perform New Music at “Coral Orgy” Event

author: Sam Sodomsky
title: Animal Collective to Perform New Music at “Coral Orgy” Event

organizations.name: animal collective to perform new music

text:
2 hrs ago Animal Collective to Perform New Music at “Coral Orgy” Event The band’s new reef-inspired music is part of “an audiovisual meditation on the secrets behind the sexual reproduction of corals” Animal Collective Photo by Andrew Benge/Redferns 
Animal Collective ’s Avey Tare , Deakin , and Geologist will perform new music at an upcoming Florida presentation called “ Coral Orgy .” The band wrote on their Instagram that the hour-long set is inspired by the reefs, and it will be set to a projection of a “cosmic world of fluorescent coral,” made by media company Coral Morphologic . The show takes place February 24 at the New World Center in Miami Beach, Florida. See the poster below. 
“Coral Orgy” is presented by Coral Morphologic, Borscht Corp., and III Points. It is described as “an audiovisual meditation on the secrets behind the sexual reproduction of corals, and an invocation towards the human quest of unlocking them.” The event seeks to raise awareness for scientific work done by non-profits including the Coral Restoration Foundation , SECORE , and Project Coral .
